description: '''Death 'n' roll''' ([[portmanteau]] of [[death metal|''death'' metal]] and [[rock and roll|rock'' 'n' roll'']]) is a subgenre of death metal music that incorporates [[hard rock]]-inspired elements. The achieved effect is that of death metal's trademark combination of [[death growl|growled vocals]] and highly [[distortion (music)|distorted]] [[guitar tunings|detuned]] guitar [[riff]]ing with elements reminiscent of 1970s hard rock and [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]]. Notable examples include [[Entombed (band)|Entombed]], [[Gorefest]], [[Carcass (band)|Carcass]], [[Xysma]], [[Convulse (band)|Convulse]], Kaptain Sun, [[Six Feet Under (band)|Six Feet Under]], [[Pungent Stench]] and the [[Fernando Colunga Ultimate Experience]].
